item.description:
The Ski Expo is a great chance to check out new ski and snowboard gear and find out more about the club at the same time. There are also usually discounts on lift passes and giveaways at the ski mountain booths at the expo.

If you are planning to go to the Expo, we'll have a booth for the Brettl-Hupfers where you can meet some of our members. We'll be at booth #99. Make sure you search us out and meet some Bretts! The expo is at the Bayside Expo Center and runs from Thursday through Sunday.

Thursday, November 19 - 4pm to 10pm
Friday, November 20 - 4pm to 10pm
Saturday, November 21 - 10am to 8pm
Sunday, November 22 - 10am to 6pm

More info on the expo website here: http://www.bewisports...
And a link to discount tickets to the expo: http://www.bewisports...

We'll also have a big group headed over to the new Teton Gravity Research film at the House of Blues on Saturday night the 21st. And we'll be giving away a some free tickets to the film during the ski expo. At the TGR film they are giving away free tickets to Mount Snow, so this is also a really great deal on a lift ticket for the winter.

Check out our next meetup for TGR:
http://www.meetup.com...


Hope to see you there.
item.name: Boston Globe Ski & Snowboard Expo Nov. 19 - 22, 2009
